thread.title: MoneyGram to Release Second Quarter 2015 Results
thread.title_full: MoneyGram to Release Second Quarter 2015 Results

title: MoneyGram to Release Second Quarter 2015 Results
text:
MoneyGram to Release Second Quarter 2015 Results Conference Call Scheduled for July 31 at 9:00 a.m. EDT MoneyGram International, Inc. 2 hours ago Content preferences Done 
DALLAS (July 7, 2015) (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MoneyGram ( MGI ) will announce its second quarter 2015 financial results on Friday, July 31, 2015. Pamela H. Patsley, chairman and chief executive officer, and Alex Holmes, executive vice president, chief financial officer and chief operating officer, will host a conference call at 9:00 a.m. EDT to discuss the financial results. The news release and the webcast will be available at ir.moneygram.com . Participants may join the call at the numbers below: Toll Free: 1-888-811-5441 Replay is available through August 7, 2015 
About MoneyGram International, Inc. 
MoneyGram is a global provider of innovative money transfer services and is recognized worldwide as a financial connection to friends and family. Whether online, or through a mobile device, at a kiosk or in a local store, we connect consumers any way that is convenient for them. We also provide bill payment services, issue money orders and process official checks in select markets. More information about MoneyGram International, Inc. is available at moneygram.com. Company Earnings
